name: A Sky Full of Stars Series

metadata.name: Ushering in the Galaxy
metadata.description:
The slopes of the hills surrounding Mt. St. Helens are littered with the remains of it's cataclysmic explosion nearly 40 years later. And yet, the universe is ushered into view each night in silence the way it has for millenia.

I love the contrast between these two extremes.  
_______________________________________
